TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a single filter entry. The filter is used to allow or exclude particular database objects during generation.

MemberSignature.Value: public EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry (string catalog, string schema, string name);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string catalog, string schema, string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The pattern to use to select the appropriate catalog.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate schema or null to not limit by schema.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate name or null to not limit by name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry"> class with the specified catalog, schema, and name filters.

MemberSignature.Value: public EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry (string catalog, string schema, string name, System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes types, System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect effect);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string catalog, string schema, string name, valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes types, valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect effect) cil managed

Docs.param: The pattern to use to select the appropriate catalog or null to not limit by catalog.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate schema or null to not limit by schema.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate name or null to not limit by name.
The type of objects to apply this filter to.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect"> value indicating whether to allow or exclude entries that match the specified filters.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry"> class the specified catalog, schema, name, and type filters, and filter effect setting.
Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate catalog.
Docs.value: The Catalog part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.

Docs.summary: Gets the effect that this filter has on results.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect"> value that indicates whether to allow or exclude entries that match the specified filters.

Docs.summary: Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate name.
Docs.value: The Name part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.

Docs.summary: Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate schema.
Docs.value: The Schema part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.

Docs.summary: Gets the types of objects that this filter applies to.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes"> value indicating the types of objects to apply to the filter to.
